resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

012 AutoSpa was officially established in 2016, making this our 5th annual successful business year! The business started off as a small sole trading business that sold Turtle Wax car products. Due to the success of that, we expanded and began to offer high-standard car wash services towards the end of 2016 and HERE WE ARE TODAY.

To provide a service that is highly standardized that sets the bar sky-high for our competitors. We aim to create long-lasting relationships with our customers by providing a service of excellent quality. Making our customer and their vehicle our FIRST priority.
We envision 012 AutoSpa becoming a franchise car-wash service business The goal is to become highly recognized in Gauteng and then expand, our company as a franchise throughout the country.
